segments.text: Excuse me , can you help me ? I would like to change rooms if possible , I couldn ’ t sleep at all last night , because the people in the room next to mine were making a lot of noise , also if at all possible , I ’ d like a room that doesn ’ t overlook the street , between the noisy neighbors and the highway outside , I didn ’ t sleep a wink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am so sorry to hear that sir , let me check and see what is available , what room are you in now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m on the 6th floor , room 698 , I ’ v had many problems with that room , just this morning , I called someone up to fix the light fixture in the bathroom , it didn ’ t work , and it still doesn ’ t work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , dear , well , it looks like we have a few rooms available , can I put you into a room on the 17th floor ? It has a balcony and it doesn ’ t face the highway .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , that would be very nice ! What do I need to do to transfer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me check you out of your old room , you have to sign here , and acknowledge these changes and also the charges to your previous room . Then I can hook you right up to room 1780 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Mmm , I don ’ t think the charges are right , can you explain them please ?
segments.speaker: S1
